ygData.msgSnippet: The Alliance base wasn t functional when it was moved, but the fact that you ll redesign BA s base isn t the point. The point is that a sub with so much power

The Alliance base wasn't functional when it was moved, but the fact 
that you'll redesign BA's base isn't the point.

The point is that a sub with so much power that it can overpower the 
IF would definetly be a base, and at that point its not fair. Once 
again, I have no prob with a sub, as long as its doesn't have the 
power of a base.

Jason, I don't know about an under city, I'll post my opinion 
tomorrow.


::Zardus::

Zardus looks over at Dark Angel, looking back to the base as it tips 
dangeroustly on its side.

"We're burying the base underground so the shields would have an 
easier time surrounding the island," he replies, frowning as the base 
tips more.

"Everyone digging, stop for a while, the base is going to be lifted," 
he says into his comm, tapping a few buttons on his wrist comp. 
Several shuttles fly out of the Iron Fist, the base seperating and 
the sections being lifted up by the shuttles.

"Allright," Zardus says into his comm again, "The work drones will 
dig, if you want to help, you can."







--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jason Lind" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:
